name: Zygarde
description: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

abilities.name: Power Construct
abilities.effect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.
abilities.description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
